snippet.title: TRANSFARRING ("Kojima's Secret") (Kojima Productions E3 Trailer)
snippet.description:
Kojima Productions and Mega64 bring you this exciting trailer for the new way of playing video games- The TRANSFARRING system! Play your game data at home or on the go!

The METAL GEAR SOLID HD COLLECTION is announced, as well as the incredible ZONE OF THE ENDERS HD COLLECTION, all part of the Transfarring world! But what other surprises does Kojima Productions hold...?

Watch Hideo Kojima's FULL interview on the Transfarring system here: http://youtu.be/VqCneCdZS7Y

http://www.konami.jp/kojima_pro/e3_2011/

http://mega64.com
